summary:
Generally enhances dragons to retain them as a lethal threat througout the game.

I have tried to keep my changes logical, lore-friendly (where applicable), and non-exotic, in order to stay close to the intended vanilla feel of dragons.
So there are no rainbow-breathing, glowing in the dark or whatnot dragons to be found here.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#EE400D][size=5]General info[/size][/color][/b]
This is a simple mod that in short generally enhances dragons to keep them as dangerous foes and a potent threat for all levels and most play-styles.
I've also tried to keep my changes logical, lore-friendly (where applicable), and non-exotic, so that the mod doesn't make the dragons feel to different, strange, weird or just crazy compared to vanilla.
For instance, even though I've added a few extra shouts, the shouts they use the most are still their default fire/frost shouts. They mostly restrict their use of the new shouts where appropriate or logical.

You'll probably enjoy this mod if you, as me, like the vanilla feel of dragons, but think they are too easy, and think other dragonmods do to much crazy stuff.

[b][color=#EE400D][size=5]Installation, uninstallation etc[/size][/color][/b]
Just download the main file and any optional files you may want and exctract to your Skyrim/Data folder. Or let the NMM do it for you.
Then make sure to enable the esm and any other esps you downloaded.
To uninstall just do the above in reverse.
No extra fuss or voodo-magic should be needed.

Load order shouldn't be any fuss either.
If you're having issues however, see if it helps to put all of the mod files after any official DLCs in the load order, with VAF_DragonMod01.esm before any associated esps.
And please ensure that no other mods are installed that make any changes to dragons.

[b][color=#EE400D][size=5]Compatability[/size][/color][/b]
The mod is compatible with both Dawnguard and Dragonborn official DLCs, just download the extensions.

Due to the simple nature of the mod and it's implementation details, it's unlikely that all of its changes will be fully applied to dragons that may be added by other mods.
As it usually is with most mods.
This is however a somewhat intentional choice by me, as I don't want my mod to inadvertently make changes to dragons that other modders have created that they have intended to be excactly as they are.
However, as I've packed all the data in the main file (VAF_DragonMod01) and made it a master file (.esm), it should be relatively easy to extend compatability to other mods if necessary.

Other than that it's definetely incompatible with any other dragonmod.

[b][color=#EE400D][size=5]Technical details[/size][/color][/b]
[color=#EE400D][size=3]Generic changes:[/size][/color]
[list]
[*] Increased health and some other stats of all dragons.
[*] Dragons regenerate health in combat, slowly, but noticable if it don't suffer damage for a small period of time.
[*] Slightly increased speed of all dragons.
[*] Added a knockback effect to their wing attack similar to the werewolf power attacks. (It can be countered by blocking)
[*] All common dragons have a constant dismay effect on NPCs (ranging from <=10 to <=35) within 250 feet.
[/list]
[color=#EE400D][size=3]Resistance changes (Not Alduin and some other special dragons):[/size][/color]
[list]
[*] 100% Resist disease
[*] 10% - 80% Resist poison
[*] 0% - 30% Resist magic
[*] 10% - 50% Resist damage
[*] 30% - 90% Resist fire or frost
[/list]
[color=#EE400D][size=3]Dragon shout changes (All dragons unless specified otherwise):[/size][/color]
[list]
[*] Added Unrelenting force shout.
[*] Added Dismay shout with area effect that will, depending on level, affect deadra, undead and dragons as well.
[*] Added Disarm shout. Not yet fully sure about wether this shout adds challenge or is simply annoying, and thus wether it will be removed or not in the future.
[*] Removed Drain vitality shout from dragons added by Dawnguard, except for Durnevhiir. I found that they used it far to often, and I'm not really into the dragons talking all the time.
[*] Added new stronger Fire/Frost-ball shouts to dragons added by Dawnguard as replacement for their Drain vitality shout.
[/list]

Note: Other than stats and adding shouts I've done few other changes to Alduin and other special dragons as some of my changes may have side-effects with their intended role in the game.

[b][color=#EE400D][size=5]Possible future changes[/size][/color][/b]
Note: These are just ideas I'm experimenting with, and may or may not be implemented in the future.
[list]
[*] Might add the player variant of fire- and frostbreath shouts to dragons.
[*] Might add a Bend will shout that affects follower and/or summoned followers/creatures to higher level Solstheim dragons.
[*] Might add a shout with similar effects as the banish deadra and/or command deadra spells to higher level dragons.
[*] Might consider changing some of the internal design of the mod for better compatability/extendability with other mods if necessary.
[/list]
